ResourceHeader.Description:
SG-70 fluxgate magnetometer provided by
IZMIRAN's Space Magnetic Research Laboratory. The magnetometer had
a range of +/- 60 nT and an accuracy of about 0.3 nT. 
It made one vector measurement every 10.24 sec.

Magnetic field measurements on the Prognoz satellites
     were carried out by IZMIRAN's Space Magnetic Research Laboratory
     (SMRL) in 1977-1984.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Triaxial Fluxgate Magnetometer experiment on the Prognoz 9 mission.
